mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mbti_questions ORDER BY question_number
SELECT * FROM mbti_questions WHERE dimension = #{dimension} ORDER BY question_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbti_questions (question_number, question_text, dimension, option_a, option_b, option_a_type, option_b_type) VALUES (#{questionNumber}, #{questionText}, #{dimension}, #{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionAType}, #{optionBType})
mapper.update: UPDATE mbti_questions SET question_number = #{questionNumber}, question_text = #{questionText}, dimension = #{dimension}, option_a = #{optionA}, option_b = #{optionB}, option_a_type = #{optionAType}, option_b_type = #{optionBType} WHERE id = #{id}
